message: Bob, I'm confident this product is worth a great deal to you. I'm offering it to you at $950,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it holds for you. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm not willing to go that high. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it holds for me.

Bob, I understand your perspective. While I appreciate your offer, I can't go below $900,000.  I believe this still represents a great value for you, considering the significant benefit this product will bring. Let's find a middle ground that works for both of us.

I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $875,000 for the product. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value it holds for me.
